text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; int i ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= t ; i ++ ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] , min = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ( n - 1 ) ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < ( n - 1 ) ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] > a [ i + 1 ] ) { min = a [ i + 1 ] ; } } int cost = min * ( n - 1 ) ; return cost ; } }
